property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) Whenever this creature attacks, you may look at 2 of your opponent's shields. Then put them back where they were.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-12 Hakuoh's Holy Spirit Power-Up Pack

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If your opponent has more shields than you do, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each light card in your graveyard.
